body.p: JaxMe 2 is supported through mailing lists

section.title: JaxMe Developers
section.p: Currently this is the only mailing list. As there is not too much traffic, it is shared by both JaxMe users and developers. If traffic grows, we'll create a separate list jaxme-user in the future. The mailing list address is jaxme-dev@ws.apache.org. Subscribing and unsubscribing works by sending mail to jaxme-dev-subscribe@ws.apache.org, or jaxme-dev-unsubscribe@ws.apache.org, respectively. This list is receiving SVN notifications.

Searchable archives of this list can be found on
http://mail-archives.apache.org/eyebrowse/SummarizeList?listId=172 and http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=jaxme-dev.
